lead_paragraph: For all the headlines screaming 'anarchy', Lewis Hamilton's public act of defiance against Mercedes in Formula One's title-deciding Abu Dhabi Grand Prix could ultimately make racing even more exciting in 2017.

headline.print_headline: Hamilton Wins Plaudits as Mercedes Ponder Punishment
headline.main: Hamilton Wins Plaudits as Mercedes Ponder Punishment

snippet: For all the headlines screaming 'anarchy', Lewis Hamilton's public act of defiance against Mercedes in Formula One's title-deciding Abu Dhabi Grand Prix could ultimately make racing even more exciting in 2017....
